code: import BigNumber from'bignumber.js';export var SLIPPAGE=new BigNumber('0.02');export function increaseWithSlippage(n){return new BigNumber(n).multipliedBy(new BigNumber(1).plus(SLIPPAGE)).integerValue(BigNumber.ROUND_FLOOR);}export function decreaseWithSlippage(n){return new BigNumber(n).multipliedBy(new BigNumber(1).minus(SLIPPAGE)).integerValue(BigNumber.ROUND_FLOOR);}export function epochformatted(){var epochStart=1612008000;var epochPeriod=4*60*60;var hour=60*60;var minute=60;var unixTimeSec=Math.floor(Date.now()/1000);if(new Date().getTime()/1000<epochStart){return"0 - Starts at ".concat(new Date(epochStart*1000).toLocaleString());}var epochRemainder=unixTimeSec-epochStart;var epoch=Math.floor(epochRemainder/epochPeriod);epochRemainder-=epoch*epochPeriod;var epochHour=Math.floor(epochRemainder/hour);epochRemainder-=epochHour*hour;var epochMinute=Math.floor(epochRemainder/minute);epochRemainder-=epochMinute*minute;return"".concat(epoch,"-0").concat(epochHour,":").concat(epochMinute>9?epochMinute:'0'+epochMinute.toString(),":").concat(epochRemainder>9?epochRemainder:'0'+epochRemainder.toString());}export function epochformattedRemaining(){var epochStart=1612008000;var epochPeriod=4*60*60;var hour=60*60;var minute=60;var unixTimeSec=Math.floor(Date.now()/1000);if(new Date().getTime()/1000<epochStart){return"0 - Starts at ".concat(new Date(epochStart*1000).toLocaleString());}var epochRemainder=unixTimeSec-epochStart;var epoch=Math.floor(epochRemainder/epochPeriod);epochRemainder-=epoch*epochPeriod;var epochHour=Math.floor(epochRemainder/hour);epochRemainder-=epochHour*hour;epochHour=3-epochHour;var epochMinute=Math.floor(epochRemainder/minute);epochRemainder-=epochMinute*minute;epochMinute=59-epochMinute;epochRemainder=59-epochRemainder;return"".concat(epoch,"-0").concat(epochHour,":").concat(epochMinute>9?epochMinute:'0'+epochMinute.toString(),":").concat(epochRemainder>9?epochRemainder:'0'+epochRemainder.toString());}
